item.title: Revision 2018
item.description: The main demoscene event of the year, Revision, took place last weekend in Saarbrücken, Germany. Once again I failed to actually make it over there, but I did manage to catch a fair amount of the live streams. The full compo results can be found here. Here are a few of my faves:
